meanings.sent1: The nondepleting water source provided endless hydration.
meanings.sent2: The nondepleting battery lasted for years without losing power.
meanings.sent3: The nondepleting snack supply magically refilled itself each night.
meanings.sent4: Her nondepleting energy seemed to come from an eternal spring within.
meanings.sent5: The nondepleting sunlight bathed the land in eternal warmth.

meanings.definition: Preserving or conserving without using up
meanings.sent1: The nondepleting forest was carefully protected by the community.
meanings.sent2: Using nondepleting methods, the farmer ensured sustainable crop growth.
meanings.sent3: The nondepleting jar of jam seemed to last forever, never running out.
meanings.sent4: Her love was like a nondepleting well, always giving and never empty.
meanings.sent5: The nondepleting supply of books in the library delighted readers.

meanings.definition: Remaining constant or unaffected by depletion
meanings.sent1: The nondepleting enthusiasm of the team kept morale high.
meanings.sent2: Despite challenges, her nondepleting optimism never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The nondepleting laughter echoed through the halls, contagious and joyful.
meanings.sent4: His nondepleting courage in the face of danger inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The nondepleting beauty of the landscape captivated all who beheld it.
